dictionaries.dictionary: select id as name, display_name as title from sys_user order by display_name
SELECT b.id AS name, b.display_name AS title FROM sys_user_group a, sys_user b WHERE a.group_id = '#P{0}' AND a.user_id = b.id ORDER BY b.display_name
SELECT b.id AS name, b.display_name AS title FROM sys_role_user a, sys_user b WHERE a.role_id = '#P{0}' AND a.user_id = b.id ORDER BY b.display_name
select t.id as name, t.name as title from SYS_ORGANIZATION t
SELECT A.TYPE_CODE AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM DICT A WHERE A .DICT_TYPE = 'CMMSCLNM-贷款担保方式'
SELECT A.TYPE_CODE AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM DICT A WHERE A .DICT_TYPE = 'CMMHKFS-信用还款方式'
SELECT A.TYPE_CODE AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM DICT A WHERE A .DICT_TYPE = 'CMMJXFS-结息方式'
SELECT A.id AS name, A.product_name AS title FROM product_attribute A
SELECT A.TYPE_CODE AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM INDUSTRY_DICT A
SELECT A.TYPE_CODE AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM DICT A WHERE A.DICT_TYPE ='APPRETURESION'
SELECT A.TYPE_CODE AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM INDUSTRY_DICT A
SELECT A.RISK AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM INDUSTRY_DICT A
SELECT A.TYPE_CODE AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM DICT A WHERE Dict_Type like 'CMMSCCST%'
SELECT A.QUESTON_CODE AS name, A.QUESTION_NAME AS title FROM QUESTION_DICT A where a.QUESTON_CODE='#P{0}'
SELECT ID AS name, PRODUCT_NAME AS title FROM PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE
select t.id as name , t.chinese_name as title from basic_customer_information t where t.user_id = '#P{0}'
SELECT A.TYPE_CODE AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM DICT A WHERE Dict_Type = 'CMMJXFS-核销条件'
SELECT A.TYPE_CODE AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM DICT A WHERE Dict_Type = 'CMMSCCCS-帐户状态'
SELECT A.TYPE_CODE AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM DICT A WHERE Dict_Type = 'DEGREEEDUCATION'
SELECT A.TYPE_CODE AS name, A.TYPE_NAME AS title FROM DICT A WHERE Dict_Type = 'GENDER'
SELECT A .TYPE_CODE AS NAME, A .TYPE_NAME AS title FROM DICT A WHERE Dict_Type = '经理层级' ORDER BY A .TYPE_CODE ASC
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = 'CMMJXFS-催收方式'
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = 'CMMSCNTC-国籍'
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = 'CMMSCHOM-住宅类型'
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = 'CMMSCMRC-婚姻状况'
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = 'CMMSCCOM-单位性质分值'
SELECT A.ID AS NAME, A.DISPLAY_NAME AS title FROM SYS_USER A WHERE A.ID NOT IN ( SELECT P.user_id AS NAME FROM ACCOUNT_MANAGER_PARAMETER P ) AND A.USER_TYPE = '1' AND A.IS_DELETED = '0'
SELECT A ."ID" AS NAME, A .DISPLAY_NAME AS title FROM SYS_USER A WHERE A .USER_TYPE = '1'

dictionary.name: CONGSHUMANAGER
dictionary.title: 添加客户经理从属关系

dictionaries.dictionary: SELECT amp.ID AS NAME, su.DISPLAY_NAME AS title FROM account_manager_parameter amp left join sys_user su on su.id = amp.user_id WHERE amp.id not in (select child_id from manager_belong_map)
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = 'DKSYL-贷款使用率'
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = 'LSHSL-利息收回率'
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = 'YQL-逾期率'
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = 'YQHSL-逾期回收率'
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = 'YQYE-逾期余额'
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = 'XCDKL-瑕疵贷款率'
select Type_code as name,Type_name as title from Dict where 1=1 and Dict_Type = '客户资质'
select distinct to_char(data_year) as name,to_char(data_year)||'年' as title from manager_assessment_score
SELECT b.id AS name, b.node_name AS title FROM node_audit b WHERE b.product_id = '#P{0}' AND b.node_type = '#P{1}' and b.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY b.seq_no asc
SELECT A .TYPE_CODE AS NAME, A .TYPE_NAME AS title FROM DICT A WHERE Dict_Type = '中心人员级别' ORDER BY A .TYPE_CODE ASC
